events.message: The customer reported filing a claim following a car collision that occurred on May 9th resulting in moderate vehicle damage.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords describing a vehicle collision and damage.
An agent specializing in vehicle accidents was assigned to handle the case for efficient processing.
Acknowledgement was sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and initiating further processing.
Requested the customer to submit the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
Customer successfully submitted all required documents including police report and multiple repair quotes.
The investigation into the claim began to verify the details of the car accident and assess liability.
Investigation concluded confirming the circumstances and validating the legitimacy of the claimed damages.
A settlement offer was made to the customer based on the assessment of repair costs and coverage limits.
Customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and communication.
Formal approval of the claim was granted following the acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer.
Payment was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account promptly as per the approved settlement agreement.
The claim file was officially closed after successful payment and confirmation from the customer.
All records and documents pertaining to the claim were archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
